title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4226.9 - Accident at the post
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4226.9 - Accident at the post

State Regulations
A horse in the hands of the starter shall receive no
further care from anyone at the starting post except the assistant starters, provided that if any accident happens to a jockey, his horse or his equipment, the starter may permit any jockey or jockeys to dismount and the horse to be
cared for during the delay; otherwise no jockey shall
dismount. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4226.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
